description.value: Character counts as having the Natural Weapons Trait applied to their unarmed capabilities. Natural Weapons: Natural Weapon does 1d10 + Strength Bonus Damage with Primitive (7), cannot parry with natural weapons, nor be disarmed except through literal disarming.
